testcase.name: The onField method returns the correct description of player with shirt number 1
The onField method throws IllegalArgumentException for negative shirt number
The onField method returns the correct description of players with shirt numbers 6, 7 and 8
The onField method returns the correct description of player with shirt number 10
The onField method throws IllegalArgumentException for unknown shirt number
The onField method returns the correct description of player with shirt number 5
The onField method returns the correct description of player with shirt number 11
The onField method returns the correct description of player with shirt number 2
The onField method returns the correct description of player with shirt number 9
The onField method returns the correct description of players with shirt numbers 3 and 4
